text: 'afalam yar hwla' alkufaar aladhin la yuminun bialakhirat eazim qudrat allah fima bayn 'aydihim wama khalfahum min alsama' wal'ard mimaa ybhr aleqwl, wa'anahuma qad ahatta bhm? 'iin nasha nakhsif bihim alard, kama faealna bqarwn, 'aw nunazil ealayhim qteana min aledhab, kama faealna biqawm sheyb, faqad 'umtirat alsama' ealayhim narana fahrqthm. 'iina fi dhalik aldhy dhakarna min qdrtna ladlalt zahirat likuli eabd rajie 'iilaa rabih baltwbt, wamaqari lah btwhydh, wmkhls lah fi alebadt
